attributes.action: prosecute and jail for manslaughter or murder any medical staff in hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: that neglect patients or do not follow instructions thereby leading to or adding to the patients death. Medical staff whatever their position should be held responsible for any decision that they make or any instruction that they do not follow.  The time has come whereby a patient can go into hospital knowing that if anything goes wrong then someone will be held responsible and receive a fitting sentence. Families are being devastated by deaths that should not have occurred.
